summary: AUTOMATIC DOOR OPENS, BUT WILL NOT CLOSE. OWNERS MANUAL RESCUE INFORMATION DOES NOT WORK. THREE MAJOR AND SEVERAL MINOR FAILURES. DOOR OPENED WHILE ON VACATION AND WAS NOT CLOSED UNTIL WE COULD GET AWAY FROM THE BEACH. TODAY OPENED DOOR IN RAIN STORM AND IT WOULD NOT CLOSE. HAVE TAKEN IT IN UNDER WARRANTY REPAIR WAS LUBRICANT. TODAY TOOK IT IN AND THEY WANT 70.00 DOLLARS TO DIAGNOSE THE PROBLEM PLUS REPAIR. THEY CLOSED IT AGAIN WITH MASSIVE LUBRICATION. *JB
